    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_78610</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Théorie d'Alfred Wegener de la dérive continentale</string>
            <string language="en">Alfred Wegener's theory of continental drift</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alfred Wegeners Theorie des Kontinentaltrifts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Teoria de Alfred Wegener da tração continental</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Teoria del Alfred Wegener di direzione 
continentale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θεωρία του Alfred Wegener's της ηπειρωτικής 
κλίσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Teoría de Alfred Wegener de la deriva continental</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette carte prouve que la forme de  l'Amérique du sud et celle de l'Afrique s'assemblent supportant la théorie d'Alfred Wegener sur le mouvement de la croûte ou de la dérive  continentale.</string>
            <string language="en">This map shows that South America and Africa's shape fit together supporting Alfred Wegener's theory of crustal movement or continental drift.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">l'Afrique</string>
            <string language="en">Africa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Alfred Wegener</string>
            <string language="en">Alfred Wegener</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">dérive continentale</string>
            <string language="en">continental drift.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">croûte</string>
            <string language="en">crust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la  terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Amérique du sud</string>
            <string language="en">South America</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">plats tectoniques</string>
            <string language="en">tectonic plates</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Karte zeigt, daß Südamerika und Afrikas 
Form zusammen unterstützenden Alfred Wegeners Theorie der crustal 
Bewegung oder des Kontinentaltrifts paßte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este mapa mostra que a forma de Ámérica do Sul 
e de África coube a teoria de Alfred Wegener junto suportando do 
movimento crustal ou da tração continental.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo programma indica che la figura dell'Africa
e del Sudamerica misura la teoria del Alfred Wegener insieme di 
sostegno di movimento della crosta terrestre o di direzione 
continentale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο χάρτης δείχνει εκείνη την τακτοποίηση μορφής
της Νότιας Αμερικής και της Αφρικής που υποστηρίζει μαζί τη 
θεωρία του Alfred Wegener's της γήινου φλοιού μετακίνησης ή
της ηπειρωτικής κλίσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta correspondencia muestra que la dimensión de 
una variable de Suramérica y de África cupo junta la teoría de 
Alfred Wegener que utilizaba del movimiento cortical o de la deriva 
continental.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Afrika</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alfred Wegener</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kontinentaltrift.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kruste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Südamerika</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">tectonic Platten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">África</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alfred Wegener</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tração continental.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">crosta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ámérica do Sul</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">placas tectonic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">direzione continentale.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
